name: TestParameterChecker
description: Unit tests for the ParameterChecker utility class, focusing on parameter validation and exception handling.

test_cases.name: testcheckParameter
test_cases.description: Tests the parameter checking functionality with valid parameters.

test_cases.name: testcheckParameterNoKey
test_cases.description: Tests the parameter checking functionality when a required parameter is missing, expecting an exception.

test_cases.name: testcheckParameterWrongType
test_cases.description: Tests the parameter type checking functionality with an incorrect type, expecting an exception.

test_cases.name: testcheckEmptyString
test_cases.description: Tests the parameter type checking functionality with an empty string, expecting an exception.

test_cases.name: testcheckNull
test_cases.description: Tests the parameter type checking functionality with a null value, expecting an exception.

test_cases.name: testMoreThanOneAllowedParam
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality to check that only one of the allowed parameters is present, expecting an exception when more than one is provided.

test_cases.name: testNoOneOfTheRequiredPrams
test_cases.description: Tests the functionality to check that at least one of the required parameters is present, expecting an exception when none are provided.
